items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-driven system to provide personalized product recommendations to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 personalized product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update dynamically based on recent user activity within 1 minute.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate improvement over baseline within 3 months of launch.
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data
non_functional: Recommendations must load within 500ms after page load
System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent recommendation requests
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: Assumed that the recommendation engine will be integrated into the existing e-commerce platform and will require historical user data for personalization.
